block.p: KAPLAN--Gertrude. Died peacefully on January 9, 2007. Loving and beloved wife for almost 65 years of the late Simon; cherished mother of Lawrence, Joseph and Sharon, and Rena and Bruce Spinowitz; adored grandmother of Zvi and Alisa, Yaffa and Ed, Pearl, Micole, Daniele, Gila and Israel, Moshe and Tovah, Raquel and Jason, Naomi, and Gabrielle; devoted sister and sister-inlaw of Alex and Goldie Gross, Eli, Sarah Katzman, and Lillian; doting great-grandmother of eight; respected aunt, relative and friend. Shiva at 1144 Sage St., Far Rockaway through Tuesday morning.
